HomePage.ctaText: Regardless of the size or complexity of your project, our team of experts is ready to help you realize it.

AboutPage.title: About us
AboutPage.subtitle: Meet Barbarić Produkt - a family company with a tradition of excellence in manufacturing and processing metal, plastic and rubber products.

ourStory.title: Our story
ourStory.content1: is a family-owned company focused on manufacturing and processing products from metal, plastic and rubber, metal structure fabrication and assembly services, anti-corrosion protection, rubberizing and plasticizing pipelines, valves, tanks and industrial plants.
ourStory.content2: We employ about a dozen workers, from qualified workers to graduate engineers, and are capable of performing even the most complex tasks. We have our own production hall and warehouse space of over 800 m² and machinery for performing all types of work.
ourStory.content3: Over more than 16 years of business, we have built a reputation as a reliable partner that delivers high-quality products and services. Our expertise in working with different materials allows us to offer comprehensive solutions tailored to the specific needs of our clients.

items.title: 16+ years of experience
items.description: Long-term experience in the industry ensures the quality and reliability of our services.

items.title: Family tradition and values
items.description: We operate based on family values that are founded on trust and integrity.

items.title: Manufacturing from various materials
items.description: We specialize in working with metal, plastic and rubber, which allows us to provide comprehensive service.

items.title: Own 800 m² facility
items.description: We have our own production hall and warehouse space for efficient production.

items.title: Modernized machinery and tools
items.description: We continuously invest in the latest technology and tools to achieve the best results.

items.title: Focus on innovation and sustainability
items.description: We are committed to developing innovative solutions with care for the environment and sustainability.

facilities.title: Our facilities
facilities.content1: We have our own production hall and warehouse space of over 800 m², which enables efficient production and fast delivery. Our machinery and tools are regularly modernized to keep up with the latest technological achievements in the industry.
facilities.content2: Thanks to our capacities, we are able to perform even the most complex tasks, from manufacturing individual components to complete industrial plants. Our equipment includes state-of-the-art machines for processing metal, plastic and rubber, which enables precision and quality in every project.

cta.title: Interested in cooperation?
cta.content: Contact us for more information about our services or to arrange potential cooperation. Our team is at your disposal for any questions.

ServicesPage.title: Services
ServicesPage.subtitle: Barbarić Produkt d.o.o. provides a wide range of services in the metal industry, from metalwork and welding to machining and maintenance of industrial plants.

quote.title: Request a quote
quote.description: For more information about our services or to get a quote, please contact us via our contact form or directly by phone.

ContactForm.title: Contact us
ContactForm.subtitle: Feel free to contact us with any questions or inquiries. Our team will respond as soon as possible.

opremaZaMora.title: EQUIPMENT FOR SEAS LAKES RIVERS - CAMPS

pontoni.pontoniDescription1: Pontoons are made of basic steel structure, hot-dip galvanized and finally painted.
pontoni.pontoniDescription2: Plastic floats sized length 970 mm, width 340 mm and height 620 mm, filled with air or water-resistant foam, are mounted on the basic steel structure.
pontoni.modularniDescription1: The size of the pontoon is formed according to the desired purpose and size by stringing floats 970 mm long along the length and the number of rows of floats 340 mm wide, thus forming the whole of the desired pontoon.
pontoni.modularniDescription2: The basic model is made in two rows of 4 floats that make a size of 3.9×2 m. Floats thus formed can make the desired shape according to a sketch or wish.
pontoni.vezaSaKopnom: Connection with land and each other is connected by a movable path 1.2 m wide.
pontoni.ribogojilista: With this combination, fish farms can be formed. If the float is damaged, it is easily replaced with a new one.

septickaJamaOpis.c: C     WATER METER WINDOW 1000 LIT. WATERPROOF
septickaJamaOpis.d: We are able to make plastic manholes with diameters of 600, 800 and 1000 mm of volume according to your wishes with connections as needed.

vodomjernoOkno.title: Water meter window
vodomjernoOkno.namjenaOpis: The water meter window is intended for installation in smaller buildings. The water meter window construction protects the water meter from freezing. After installation of the installation with fittings (pipes, elbows, valves and water meter), everything is covered with a thermo cover and finally with the water meter cover itself. The housing and cover of the water meter window are made of polyethylene with ribs for reinforcement, and no additional concreting around it is required. For vehicle traffic over the water meter window, the plastic housing needs to be reinforced with concrete, and instead of a plastic cover, a steel cover should be installed.

tehnickeKarakteristike.boja: Housing color: white, blue or black

instalacija.ventili: Valves with unions for water meter

rotoLjev.title: ROTO MOLDING
rotoLjev.productDescription: PLASTIC PRODUCTS ARE MADE OF HIGH-DENSITY POLYETHYLENE, AN INERT MATERIAL FOR USE IN THE FOOD INDUSTRY. CONTAINERS HAVE SMOOTH AND EASILY WASHABLE SURFACES. THE MATERIAL IS RESISTANT TO TEMPERATURES FROM -20 TO +50°C.
